title: Silky Coconut Panna Cotta with Peach Compote

label.instructions: Best enjoyed within 3 days or freeze.

ingredients.ingredient: 4 cups full fat coconut milk- divided (Natural Value)
ingredients.note: the last batch used the simple coconut milk and it separated.

instructions: Open coconut milk cans and blend all coconut milk with immersion blender (the Natural Value coconut separates otherwise).
Pour one quarter of total volume of coconut milk into a medium saucepan and sprinkle evenly with the gelatin.
Let the milk sit for 5-10 minutes to allow the gelatin to soften.
Heat the milk and gelatin over medium heat, stirring constantly, until gelatin is dissolved and milk begins to steam.
Stir the remaining coconut milk and honey into the warm milk and whisk until all the ingredients are dissolved.
Remove the pan from the heat and stir in the vanilla. Let the mixture cool for 10 minutes or so before jarring.
Pour into half pint mason jars, filling 3/4 of the way full, leaving room for aout 3 tbs to .25 cup compote
